Title: 1. McSpicy Museum
Description: 13th-25th May  Image adapted from: @mcdsg via Instagram PSA: Macdonners is giving out 50 free – yes, free – McSpicy burgers daily at 12pm and 5pm at the McSpicy Musuem pop-up. This is the week you want to forget about your diet and join fellow Macs fans to try a new flavour too: Smoky Chilli Mayo McSpicy . Apart from all the food, the museum will also have fun games and a photobooth. Admission: Free Venue: Bugis Junction Dates: 13th-25th May Time: 11am-9pm

Title: 2. Kebaya Catwalk vending machines
Description: Now till 19th May  View this post on Instagram A post shared by National Heritage Board (@nhb_sg)  Heads up, fellow Singaporeans. Remember the kebaya’s UNESCO win ? Well, someone’s celebrating in the cutest way possible. Keep your eyes peeled for Kebaya Catwalk vending machines popping up around Singapore. Inside, you’ll find blind box keychains featuring adorable local cats rocking different kebaya styles – Sulam, Panjang, Pendek, and Kotabaru. Each set is free and comes with a keychain, info card, stand, and box. You can even snag the Kebaya Pendek and Panjang designs right now at Bukit Panjang Plaza. Happy collecting! Venue: Bukit Panjang Plaza Dates: Now till 19th May
